players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1: The villager Diana was found dead.
Charlie: "Bob, why did you visit Diana last night?"
Bob: "I was just checking on Diana, she seemed uneasy lately."
You: "Bob, did you notice anything unusual about Diana last night?"
You: "Bob, did you notice anything unusual about Diana last night?"
Bob: "Alice, I think Diana was feeling unwell lately. Let's keep an eye on her."
Charlie: "Bob, why did you visit Diana last night when she was dead?"
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Day 1: Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

You killed Diana.

Alice: "Bob, did you notice anything unusual about Diana last night?"

Charlie: "Bob, why did you visit Diana last night when she was dead?"
